entry.title: Pubkey addresses
entry.summary: It appears that the speaker has gained an understanding of a concept and is expressing their gratitude for it. The context suggests that the concept relates to saving space by having shorter scripts in transactions. This could be in reference to programming or coding. The speaker seems to have had a moment of clarity and now understands the benefits of writing shorter scripts in transactions. It is not clear what specifically led to this understanding, but it is possible that someone explained it to them or they figured it out on their own. Regardless, the speaker is grateful for the newfound knowledge.
